articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Clarifies Its Stand on UNSC's Increasing Threat
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Clarifies Its Stand on UNSC's Increasing Threat
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement on Friday as regards the UNSC's threat to put additional sanctions against the DPRK, terming its successful nuclear test a violation of the UNSC Resolution 1718.
					 Over the past several decades, the DPRK has made every possible effort for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, but the U.S., instead of seeking a substantial removal of nuclear threats, has steadily increased the level of pressure upon the DPRK and it has eventually brought even the six-party talks to collapse in wanton violation of the principles of respect for the sovereignty and sovereign equality, the underlying spirits of the September 19 Joint Statement, over the DPRK's launch of satellite, the universally recognized right of each state, the statement noted, and said:
					
					 At present, some countries were shocked at the news of the DPRK's second nuclear test. But an exceptional act has its exceptional reason.
					
					 The recent nuclear test conducted by the DPRK is the 2054th one on the earth.
					
					 The five permanent members of the UNSC have conducted 99.99 percent of all the nuclear tests.
					
					 Those countries have posed the biggest nuclear threats to the world. But they took issue with our first nuclear test, which was conducted in October 2006 as a self-defensive measure to cope with increased nuclear threats by the U.S., terming it a "threat to the international peace" and adopted the sanctions resolution against the DPRK. This is exactly the UNSC Resolution 1718.
					
					 This resolution fabricated by the hypocrites has immediately invited a total rejection by the DPRK and we still do not recognize such resolution.
					
					 The UNSC with such a record produced the "presidential statement" on April 14 putting in question only the satellite launched by the DPRK for the peaceful purpose and put into force the sanctions under its Resolution 1718 on April 24 only to cause an unbearable insult to the dignity of our people and gravely infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is neither a signatory to the Nuclear Non-proliferation Treaty nor to the Missile Technology Control Regime or MTCR. Such being the case, it has a right to conduct as many nuclear tests or missile launches as it wants in the event that the supreme interests of the state are infringed upon. Such self-defensive measures do not run counter to any other international law.
					
					 The UNSC has committed such unprecedented crime as the wanton infringement upon the right of a sovereign state to explore outer space for peaceful purposes and, instead of repenting of it, it is proactive in its outcry to cover up its crime. Under these circumstances, the DPRK, at this point, would like to draw a clear line of confrontation which will help clearly state who is to blame for the future unpredictable development of the situation.
					
					 First, the UNSC is involved in its high-handed act which will never be tolerated and it is the part of the self-defensive measures of the DPRK to respond to this with its own nuclear test which we had already made public to the world. There is a limit to our patience. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and other forces courting the U.S. favor who should be held entirely responsible for driving the situation to such a pass as they took the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch to the UN to launch a condemnation campaign. 
					
					 It is what they said to the DPRK that a satellite launch belongs to an independent right of a sovereign state. But, after our actual satellite launch, they took sides with the U.S. in its move to condemn the DPRK. 
					
					 Those countries remained silent when the large scale nuclear war exercises such as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises took place in the depth of the Korean peninsula. But, When the DPRK was compelled to conduct a nuclear test as a self-defensive measure, they are united in their voice, condemning it as "a threat to the regional peace and stability".
					
					 It means that they do not like the DPRK to possess what they had already put in place. In the final analysis, they mean small countries should obey big countries. The DPRK, though small in its territory and population, has self-confidence and grit that it is a politically and militarily strong country. 
					
					 Second, we solemnly demanded that the UNSC make an apology for its crime of having seriously encroached upon the sovereignty of a sovereign state in gross violation of the Space Treaty and that it withdraw all its previously-crafted, unfair resolutions and decisions. Such a demand still remains in force.
					
					 As long as the Permanent Five alone invested with veto power and nuclear weapons have the mandate to identify what constitutes a "threat to international peace and security", the UNSC is not supposed to bring their own acts of intimidation into question indefinitely.
					
					 As long as the UNSC fails to respond to the DPRK's just demand, the DPRK will not recognize any resolution and decision of the UNSC in the future, too.
					
					 Third, if the UNSC will make further provocative actions, this will inevitably lead to the DPRK's approach towards adopting stronger self-defensive counter-measures.
					
					 The end of the Cold War worldwide works only between big powers, but a Cold War still persists on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The UNSC-crafted UN Command itself is a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 Any hostile act by the UNSC immediately means the abrogation of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The world will soon find out how the army and people of the DPRK will stand up against the high-handed and get-it-alone approach of the UNSC in defending its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. is keen on using a catchphrase "Carrot and stick."
					
					 It would be better for the "Donkey" of the U.S. Democratic Party to lick the carrot.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Sycophancy and Servility to Japan Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Sycophancy and Servility to Japan Flayed
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The puppet prime minister of south Korea, when meeting Japanese Prime Minister Aso recently, vociferated about "building of future-oriented and matured partnership" and "close cooperation in handling north Korea's missile and nuclear issues," etc. 
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak, too, in his recent telephone conversation with Aso cried out for "international cooperation," taking issue with the DPRK's nuclear test aimed at bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence. 
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 949 issued on May 29 denounces these reckless remarks made by the group of the traitors as the thrice-cursed sycophancy and treachery to serve Japan as they are aimed at escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen in conspiracy with the sworn enemy of the Korean nation. 
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the Lee group is soliciting  "international cooperation" from the Japanese reactionaries in the anti-DPRK campaign, not content with speaking ill of the DPRK, terming its satellite launch and nuclear test "threat to peace" and "provocation." 
					
					 The information bulletin goes on:
					
					 As already clarified more than once, the DPRK has bolstered up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence in order to reliably protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation from the hostile policies of the U.S., Japanese reactionaries and other forces of aggression toward the DPRK and their moves to ignite a war and champion peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The group of traitors are the group of "five traitors of 1905" of contemporary type who should not be allowed to go scot-free any longer as they are keen to stifle compatriots in collusion with the sworn enemy of the nation, unaware of how much they benefit from the DPRK's Songun politics. 
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the group of traitors for its hideous acts of treachery adding to the crimes it has committed against the nation but force it to pay a thousand-fold price for them. 
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to stop going reckless, clearly mindful that it will face only a stern and merciless judgment of the nation and a miserable end for its sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Indian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Indian Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to S. M. Krishna on his appointment as foreign minister of India.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in conformity with the interests of the two peoples in the future, Pak in the message wished him big success in his new job.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Shanghai Association for Cultural Exchanges with Foreign Countries of China led by Assistant to Secretary General Gao Ling arrived here Friday to participate in a calligraphy and painting exhibition of children of the DPRK and China.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful in World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful in World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters carried off five gold, four silver and two bronze medals at the 1st World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships held in Thailand from May 20 to 24.
					 Kim Kuk Hyang lifted 221kg total with 96kg in snatch and 125kg in jerk. She thus came first in the women's above 69kg category competition and garnered three gold medals.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Hyo Sim took the second of the women's 53kg category in the total points by placing first in snatch and third in jerk and Ryo Un Hui the first in women's 63kg snatch. And Rim Jong Sim captured three silver medals in the women's 58kg and Yun Han Min one bronze medal in the men's 50kg.

articles.title: Brisk Research to Protect and Proliferate Animals and Plants
articles.content:
Brisk Research to Protect and Proliferate Animals and Plants
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Much effort is channeled to protect and proliferate animals and plants in the DPRK.
					The Research Center for Biodiversity and Eco-Engineering under the State Academy of Sciences plays the pivotal role in the undertaking.
					
					In recent years the center has registered a series of successes in the systematic survey of and research into the animals and plants of the country in the extermination crisis and main migratory birds and the work for protecting and restoring their habitats in different parts of the country.
					
					Scientists have pushed ahead all along with the survey of the main migratory and stationary birds of the country including crane, snipe, swan and duck genera and stork, spoonbill and others which are under protection in the world and fauna and flora which live in the nature reserves, thus laying a foundation to prevent the reduction of biodiversity and put the natural protection work on a scientific basis.
					
					They have published many reference books and made videotapes with data and photographs collected during the spot survey to widely introduce the correctness of the DPRK's policy of nature preservation and the significance of biodiversity protection.
					
					Now they are estimating biodiversity in wetlands and surveying and studying the sustainable use and protection measures in a systematic way.
					
					The tissue culture research room of the center has also achieved successes in the research to widely propagate good species of trees and high-yielding fruit trees by the method of tissue culture to be sent to various units of the country.

articles.title: Hero Sami Secondary School in Haeju City
articles.content:
Hero Sami Secondary School in Haeju City
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- There are many schools in the DPRK which represent the noble life of heroes who dedicated their youth and lives to the motherland and people.
					 Among them is the Hero Sami Secondary School, the Twice Honored Red Flag School, in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The school, alma mater of 13 Heroes of the DPRK and Labour Heroes, bears august footmarks of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung visited the school (the then Haeju Senior Middle School) in August, Juche 37 (1948). There he acquainted himself with   preparations for a new school year down to details and expounded all the questions arising in school education and training of students.
					
					 Abiding by the educational theses, it has built up well-furnished modern laboratories and practice rooms to combine theory with practice while steadily improving educational methods and contents and giving substantial basic technical education, thus bringing up lots of promising personnel.
					
					 The school has always been highly appreciated in national school contests. It has produced more than 50 winners of "July 15 Honor Student Prize" and hundreds of awardees of academic degrees or professorship among its graduates.
					
					 It is doing its utmost for the improvement of teaching and training of students in order to raise them to be heroes and stout pillars of the Songun era who would render distinguished services for the motherland and people.

articles.title: Mountain-climbing Routes of Mt. Myohyang Tell Warm Affection
articles.content:
Mountain-climbing Routes of Mt. Myohyang Tell Warm Affection
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Mountaineers are found on the sightseeing roads leading to the top of Mt. Myohyang, a famous mountain of Korea.
					 Walking along the routes extending a total of over 68 kilometers, which lead to the Manphok Ravine, the Sangwon Hermitage, Piro Peak area and other places, they with deep emotion recollect the warm affection shown for the people by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who clearly indicated the orientation and ways for the building of the beauty spot, making around of Mt. Myohyang for days in May Juche 70 (1981).
					
					 He solved the issues arising in mountaineering down to details and designated the sightseeing periods, routes and lodging and boarding places according to groups of people.
					
					 He took the lead in exploring the precipice lanes lack of safety facilities and steps, with the result that over 24 kilometer-long mountaineering paths came into being in the Piro Peak area.
					
					 Under his meticulous care, the sightseeing routes to Popwang Peak via Sangwon Ravine, to the Kuchung (Nine-Storeyed) Falls via the cliff road of the Manphok Ravine, to the Isonnam Falls in the Hapiro area via the stream flowing in the Chilsong Ravine and to Piro Peak via Jungpiro were laid and a total of 4,000-odd meters of safety chain handrails were installed.
					
					 Various shapes of bridges and over 14,000 steps were built in different places of sightseeing routes and more than 1,500 footholds on rocky roads. And many pavilions and resting sites including Oson Pavilion, Hyangro Pavilion, Undok Pavilion, Pison Pavilion, Sonnam Pavilion and Piromun Resting Site made their appearance.
					
					Many a working people from all walks of life, school youth and children, overseas Koreans and foreigners have expedited the mountain over last decades. They were deeply moved by the love shown by Kim Jong Il for the people.

articles.title: Japan's Scenario to Attack "Enemy Bases" Termed Reckless
articles.content:
Japan's Scenario to Attack "Enemy Bases" Termed Reckless
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- By the scenario to "attack enemy bases" touted by the Japanese reactionaries these days they had the DPRK in mind. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 They are now discussing fighters and types and number of bombs to be used for striking the DPRK's "missile launching base" and methods of air raid and return flight, etc. 
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the Japanese militarists have become a very dangerous force of aggression against the Korean people and their enemy.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are exploiting the DPRK's satellite launch as a pretext for rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense and seeking this as a golden opportunity for realizing their wild ambition for reinvasion, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The irony is that they are going so reckless as to call for striking the "missile launching base" without trying to know what towering grudge and resentment the Korean people have towards Japan, how firm their resolution and will are and what powerful national defence capability the DPRK has. 
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces have means and muscle strong enough to decisively frustrate any provocation of the hostile forces. 
					
					 In case Japan starts a war of reinvasion, its whole territory will not be safe from retaliatory strikes as it does not have depth.
					
					 Should the Japanese reactionaries ignite a reckless war of reinvasion, failing to properly understand the present reality, they will end up suffering their final destruction.
					
					 They should not forget that their scenario for attacking "enemy bases" will only mean tolling death-knell, warns the article.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Aggressor Forces from S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Aggressor Forces from S. Korea Called for
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- In order to realize the Koreans' desire for independent reunification, peace and prosperity they should get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea as early as possible and put an end to its policy of colonial domination. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea is an indispensable requirement for the independent development and democracy of the south Korean society, a precondition for ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and a prerequisite to the independent reunification of the nation. 
					
					 The U.S. presence and domination over south Korea are hurdles lying in the way of the socio-political development and democracy of south Korea and the root cause of all sorts of misfortune and sufferings its people are now undergoing. 
					
					 There is neither independence nor human rights in south Korea which the U.S. imperialist aggressors lord it over. The U.S. forces are no more than aggressors and occupation forces that are implementing the U.S. policy of aggression toward the DPRK and its policy of domination over south Korea on the spot. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces have never allowed the south Korean people to desire independence and democracy, progress and reunification.
					
					 The U.S. has threatened the DPRK by force of arms and done harm to the peace on the peninsula with its racket for a war of aggression against the north. 
					
					 The U.S. helped ultra-right conservative forces come back to power in south Korea to block Korea's reunification. 
					
					 Had the U.S. imperialists pulled its forces out of south Korea according to the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly, the Koreans would have achieved the country's reunification long ago through reconciliation and concerted efforts. 
					
					 The U.S. should unconditionally withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea as unanimously demanded by the Koreans.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Decision to Fully Participate in PSI Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Decision to Fully Participate in PSI Flailed
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on May 26 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' decision to fully participate in the PSI.
					 The statement condemned the Lee Myung Bak regime for officially announcing its full participation in the PSI on the same day under the pretext of the north's underground nuclear test.
					
					 It held that the north conducted a nuclear test because the United States and its followers kicked off a noisy racket for sanctions against the north, taking issue with its satellite launch.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee regime perpetrated such rash act as adding fuel to the burning house by fully participating in the PSI, the statement said, adding that the PSI is a mechanism faked up by the U.S. to pressurize those countries hostile to it, the north in particular, under the pretext of "non-proliferation of weapons of mass destruction."
					
					 It stressed that the prevailing situation requires all Koreans to turn out in the struggle to protect peace on the Korean Peninsula from the reckless acts of the Lee regime.
					
					 The Lee regime should bear in mind that it will not be able to escape the nation's stern judgment, it warned.

articles.title: General Strike Launched by Construction Workers' Union in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strike Launched by Construction Workers' Union in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Construction Workers' Union of south Korea entered a general strike on May 27 in protest against the puppet authorities' unpopular labor policy, according to south Korean KBS.
					The general strike was declared after its negotiations with the "Ministry of Land and Maritime Development" over such demands as the improvement of working conditions ended in failure.
					
					The organization announced that it would hold a rally involving at least 20,000 unionists in Seoul to protest the authorities' unreasonable behavior.

articles.title: Rally for Peace and Disarmament Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rally for Peace and Disarmament Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 90th rally for peace and disarmament in Seoul on May 26 at which it denounced the puppet belligerent forces' war preparations.
					 A resolution read out at the rally accused the "Ministry of National Defense" of confirming recently the proposal for adjusting the "basic plan for defense reform" the keynote of which is to preferentially push forward the introduction of latest offensive weapons for the ground force.
					
					 Noting that the share of expenses for introducing U.S. made weapons will increase in the "mid-term defense plan for 2010-2014" to be confirmed in the future and the military budget for next year, the resolution demanded an immediate cancellation of such plan.
					
					 The ministry is pushing ahead with the expansion of the Mugon-ri drill ground despite the opposition of the inhabitants in Ohyon-ri, the resolution noted, adding that this is part of the moves to carry out the U.S. strategy for a war of aggression against the north.
					
					 It called upon all the people to turn out in the actions demanding a stop to the introduction of U.S. made weapons and arms reduction for peace.
					
					 The resolution declared the organization would wage a dynamic struggle for peace against war in firm solidarity with the inhabitants to protect their native place from the military's unilateral action to grab land.

articles.title: Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Off Press
articles.content:
General Strike Launched by Construction Workers' Union in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the May issue of its magazine "Paektu-Halla."
					 The magazine carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il giving on-the-spot guidance to the Rakwon Machine Complex.
					
					 In articles titled "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il reelected chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il visited the General Satellite Control and Command Centre on April 5 to watch the process of launching experimental communications satellite Kwangmyongsong-2" the magazine stressed that Kim Jong Il's reelection as NDC chairman is high honor and happiness of the army and people of the DPRK and a great auspicious event of the country and the nation.
					
					 The articles said that the successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 would instill inexhaustible strength and courage into the army and people of the DPRK who have turned out in the final charge for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The magazine introduced accounts of events held by the association to commemorate the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and celebrate the reelection of Kim Jong Il as NDC chairman and dealt with news of the homeland and the branches under the association.

articles.title: MINREX fustiga la conducta del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU
articles.content:
MINREX fustiga la conducta del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU trata de sancionar de nuevo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusando la exitosa prueba nuclear de esta de violacion de la "resolucion No. 1718", el portavoz de la cancilleria de la RPDC hizo publica este viernes la siguiente declaracion:
					  Durante varios decenios pasados, nuestro pais vino realizando todos los esfuerzos posibles por desnuclearizar la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Sin embargo, Estados Unidos intensifico constantemente la amenaza nuclear lejos de eliminarla practicamente y al fin y al cabo, rompio el proceso de las conversaciones a 6 bandas al violar flagrantemente el principio de respeto a la soberania e igualdad de la misma, que constituye el espiritu fundamental de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre, cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial, un derecho universal.
					
					 Algunos paises estan expresando ahora su espanto por nuestra segunda prueba nuclear.
					
					 Pero, detras de una accion inusual hay la razon tambien inusitada.
					
					 El reciente ensayo nuclear de nuestro pais se realizo por 2 mil 54a vez a escala planetaria.
					
					 El 99.99% de la totalidad de esas pruebas fue ejecutado por los 5 miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					 La "resolucion No. 1718" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU es aquella de sancion anti-RPDC que fabricaron esos mayores portadores de armas nucleares del mundo calificando de "amenaza a la paz internacional" la primera prueba nuclear que realizo nuestro pais en octubre de 2006 como medida de autodefensa frente a la creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					 Tan pronto como fuera publicada, esa "resolucion" inventada por los hipocritas fue rechazada totalmente por nuestro pais que aun no quiere reconocerla ni un comino.
					
					 El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU invento el pasado 14 de abril la "declaracion presidencial", que cuestiona unicamente nuestro lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos, y el dia 24, llevo a efecto la sancion correspondiente a la "resolucion No. 1718" insultando insoportablemente la dignidad del pueblo coreano e infringiendo severamente la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					 Nuestro pais, fuera del Tratado de No Proliferacion y del sistema de control de la tecnologia de misil, tiene el derecho a realizar en la medida suficiente la prueba nuclear o el lanzamiento de misil cuando se vean violados los maximos intereses estatales, y esta medida de defensa legitima no contraviene a ningun derecho internacional.
					
					  Dado que el Consejo de Seguridad habla acaloradamente primero para ocultar, en lugar de arrepentirse, su inaudito crimen de violar el derecho al desarrollo espacial con fines pacificos de un Estado soberano, nuestro pais quiere fijar en claro en este momento el actual limite de confrontacion para el dividendo correcto de las responsabilidades por la posterior evolucion de la situacion que nadie puede prever. 
					
					  Primero, nuestra reciente prueba nuclear forma parte de la medida de autodefensa que hemos tomado frente a la nunca perdonable conducta de gangster del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU como ya habiamos anunciado al mundo.
					
					  La paciencia tambien tiene su limite.
					
					  La responsabilidad de tal desenvolvimiento de la situacion recae enteramente sobre EE.UU. y las fuerzas adulonas y seguidoras a el que escenificaron la farsa de censura a nuestro pais llevando a la ONU el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos.
					
					  Esos paises, que nos dijeron de cara a cara que el lanzamiento de satelite artificial es un derecho independiente de los Estados soberanos, libraron esa campana de censura en la ONU una vez lanzado el satelite.
					
					  Son esos paises los que guardaban silencio cuando se libraban en la profundidad de la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de gran envergadura como "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" y corean ahora que la prueba nuclear realizada como inevitable medida autodefensiva de la RPDC representa la "amenaza a la paz y la seguridad de la region".
					
					 Esto quiere decir que no les gustan que nuestro pais posea lo que tenian ellos exclusivamente. 
					
					 O sea, significa que los paises pequenos deben obedecer a los grandes.
					
					 Aunque nuestro pais es pequeno tanto en la dimension territorial como en el numero de la poblacion, se siente orgulloso y lleno de coraje por ser digna potencia en sentido politico y militar.
					
					  Segundo, la RPDC demando solemnemente que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU pida disculpas por su crimen de violar flagrantemente la soberania de un Estado soberano haciendo lo mismo con el tratado del cosmos y anule todas resoluciones y decisiones fabricadas injustamente. Esta demanda sigue siendo valida.
					
					  Mientras que el derecho a definir cual es la "amenaza a la paz y la seguridad internacionales" pertenezca solo a los 5 paises miembros permanentes, que tienen el veto y las armas nucleares, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no cuestionara jamas la amenaza proveniente de ellos.
					
					  Mientras que el Consejo de Seguridad rehuse escuchar nuestra justa demanda, no reconoceremos en lo adelante tampoco las resoluciones y las decisiones del Consejo.
					
					  Tercero, en el caso de que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU incurra en la mayor provocacion, seran inevitables mas medidas nuestras de autodefensa frente a ella.
					
					 Si bien ha terminado la Guerra Fria en la palestra mundial, especificamente, entre las potencias, esta contienda persiste todavia en la misma magnitud en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 La "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU", fabricada por el Consejo de Seguridad, es precisamente una parte signataria del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea.
					
					 Las acciones hostiles del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU significan la quiebra del citado Acuerdo de Armisticio.
					
					 El mundo vera pronto como nuestro ejercito y pueblo defenderan su dignidad y soberania haciendo frente hasta el final a la coercion y a las arbitrariedades del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					 Le gusta a EE.UU. hablar de la zanahoria y el garrote cada vez que hace uso de la palabra.
					
					 Seria mejor que esa zanahoria la coman los burros del Partido Democratico de ese pais.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia acciones projaponesas de camarilla surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia acciones projaponesas de camarilla surcoreana
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ATCC) -- En el reciente encuentro con su homologo japones Aso, el primer ministro titere del Sur de Corea hablo del "establecimiento de las relaciones de socio con vistas al futuro y maduras" y de la "cooperacion estrecha en el problema de misil y el nuclear del Norte (de Corea)".
					 El traidor Lee Myung Bak sostuvo tambien conversaciones telefonicas con Aso acusando la prueba nuclear realizada por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el fin de fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa y abogando por la "cooperacion internacional" en la campana anti-RPDC.
					
					 En su informacion no. 949 publicada el dia 29, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) califico tal chismografia de la banda del traidor Lee de imperdonable conducta vendepatria y servil a Japon que busca la confrontacion fratricida en contubernio con el enemigo jurado (Japon) de la nacion coreana, y continuo:
					
					 El hecho de que la camarilla de Lee suplica a los reaccionarios japoneses la "cooperacion internacional" anti-RPDC muestra que no le bastaron todos esos improperios como la "amenaza a la paz" y la "provocacion" de que hizo uso para calumniar el lanzamiento de satelite artificial y la prueba nuclear realizados por la connacional RPDC.
					
					  Como ya habia anunciado varias veces, la RPDC fortalece su disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa a fin de salvaguardar seguramente la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana frente a la politica hostil a la RPDC y las maniobras belicistas de las fuerzas agresoras como Estados Unidos y los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					  Esa banda de traidores, que inconscientes de que se benefician del Songun (priorizacion militar) de la RPDC, intenta atropellar a los connacionales en complicidad con los enemigos jurados con que no se puede convivir bajo el mismo cielo, es el rebano de los "5 enemigos de Ulsa" (estos vendieron la patria a Japon en el siglo pasado) de version contemporanea que debe ser castigado a muerte por los compatriotas.
					
					  La RPDC no perdonara jamas sino cobrara sin falta el precio centuplo de los actos vendepatrias de la banda de Lee, que esta abultando su expediente criminal.
					
					  La banda de Lee debe actuar con juicio sabiendo bien que sus acciones vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias y campana de confrontacion con la RPDC traeran el veredicto severo e implacable de la nacion y el tragico fin de si misma.

articles.title: Pesistas coreanos ganan 11 de medallas en el mundial de juniors
articles.content:
Pesistas coreanos ganan 11 de medallas en el mundial de juniores
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ATCC) -- Los pesistas coreanos conquistaron 5 de medallas de oro, 4 de plata y 2 de bronce en el primer campeonato mundial de juniores de levantamiento de pesas efectuado del dia 20 al 24 en Tailandia.
					  En su division de mas de 69 kilos (f), Kim Kuk Hyang ocupo el primer lugar en el arranque, el envion y en total al levantar 96kg, 125kg, 221 kg, respectivamente, y gano asi 3 medallas de oro.
					
					 Kim Hyo Sim termino en el segundo lugar en el peso de 53 kg (f) al situarse en el primer lugar en el arranque y en el tercero en envion. De esta manera, alcanzo 3 preseas de diferentes colores.
					
					 Ryo Un Hui conquisto una medalla de oro al resultar ganadora en el arranque de la categoria de 63kg (f) mientras Rim Jong Sim obtuvo 3 medallas de plata en la division de 58 kg (f).
					
					 El muchacho Yun Han Min tuvo que conformarse con una de bronce de la categoria de 50kg (m).

articles.title: Entidad surcoreana censura decision de banda de MB de participar en PSI
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana censura decision  de banda de MB de participar en PSI
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ATCC) -- La Solidaridad por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte del 15 de Junio del Sur de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 una declaracion para condenar la decision de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak de participar totalmente en la "iniciativa de no proliferacion de las armas de exterminio masivo" (PSI en ingles).
					  El documento denuncia el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak que bajo el pretexto del ensayo nuclear subterraneo del Norte de Corea publico oficialmente la participacion total en la "PSI".
					
					  Insiste en que el Norte de Corea realizo la prueba nuclear, lo cual se debe a que Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras recurren persistentemente al alboroto de la sancion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusando el lanzamiento de satelite de esta.
					
					  Sin embargo, el "poder" de Lee decidio la participacion total del Sur de Corea en la "PSI", lo que es una locura semejante a echar la gasolina al fuego, condena la nota y pone al desnudo que la "PSI" es un aparato que fabrico EE.UU. para presionar a los paises hostiles, particularmente al Norte de Corea, bajo el rotulo de "no proliferacion de las armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					  Subraya que la situacion dada demanda a todos a levantarse en la lucha por preservar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana frente al imprudente acto del "poder" de Lee.
					
					  Advierte que el "poder" de Lee debe darse clara cuenta de que no evitaria la severa sentencia de la nacion.
